title: Instructional Aide (FWS Eligible) Student Worker III 97343BR
duties_responsibilities: Assist instructor in class administration, preparation, classroom activities, and exam proctoring
Grading resulting work using a common rubric
Facilitation of group and class activities
Instruct and tutor students in college-level social science courses
Hold study sessions for social science courses
Tutor individual students and small groups of students
required_qualifications: A significant amount of specialized training or experience is required
preferred_qualifications: College level experience in social science courses
Advanced understanding of discipline as appropriate for course assignment
Ability to effectively teach and convey directions and concepts to students
Completion of assigned course with a letter grade of B or higher
Teaching and/or tutoring experience is preferred
Experience working with underrepresented populations and first generation students
Familiarity with Canvas including features like quizzes, assessments, discussion boards and peer evaluations
